forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 23C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 73F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
